summary: as of february 28, 2018, 2,182 cases of MERS-CoV infection were reported to WHO worldwide. the aim of this study was to identify the clinical and epidemiological characteristics of MERS-CoV infection. fifty percent of patients developed acute kidney injury, 29% were on hemodialysis and 16% needed extra-corporeal membrane oxygenation. the rest of patients had recovered from the infection and discharged home.
